Game Setting Options
Additional Free Spins cannot be won during Free Spins.
Stake level is the number of coins bet per line.
The stake level is set using the LEVEL selector.
Free Spins are played at the same stake level and coin value as the round that activated Free Spins.
The spin button plays the game at the current stake level and coin value.
3 or more Scatter symbols appearing anywhere on the reels in the main game activate Free Spins according to the PAYTABLE.
4 Scatters = 15 Free Spins

Bet level is the number of coins bet per bet line.

Wild symbol substitution pays the highest possible winning combination on a bet line according to the PAYTABLE.
Bet line wins pay if in succession from the leftmost reel to the rightmost reel.

In the event of malfunction of the gaming hardware/software, all affected game bets and payouts are rendered void and all affected bets refunded.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.
When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum bet lines and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX STAKE plays the game at the maximum bet lines, and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX STAKE must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.

When playing at the highest bet level, MAX BET plays the game at the maximum win matches and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.
Drag or tap the slider to enable autoplay to set the autoplay options and the number of rounds. Autoplay plays the game for the selected number of spins.

A bet line win in coins is equal to the value shown on the PAYTABLE multiplied by the bet level.
A bet line win in currency is equal to the win in coins multiplied by the coin value.
A win match win in currency is equal to the win in coins multiplied by the coin value.
Winning combinations and payouts are made according to the Paytable.
